title: Add About Us page featuring creators

requirements.text: Create a new About Us page at route '/about' that prominently features the creators: Shreya Salu and Bella Ann Kurian from Excelsior English School

quotes: ADD about page featuring creators Shreya Salu and Bella Ann Kurian from Excelsior English School.

acceptanceCriteria: About Us page is accessible at /about route
Page displays both creator names: Shreya Salu and Bella Ann Kurian
Page mentions their affiliation with Excelsior English School
Page follows the existing app's green-themed design system

requirements.text: Add an 'About Us' navigation link in the header that directs users to the new About Us page
acceptanceCriteria: About Us link appears in the main navigation header alongside existing links
Link is visible on both desktop and mobile views
Clicking the link navigates to /about page
Link styling matches existing navigation items

constraints: Follow the existing Kerala-focused green color theme
Maintain consistency with the current Layout component structure
Use TanStack Router for the new route definition
nonGoals: Adding additional pages beyond the About Us page
Changing the backend or adding new backend functionality
